original_text: And they went up into the city: and when they were come into the city, behold, Samuel came out against them, for to go up to the high place.
korean_text: 그들이 성읍으로 올라가서 그리로 들어갈 때에 사무엘이 마침 산당으로 올라가려고 마주 나오더라

sentences.original_text: And they went up into the city
and when they were come into the city
behold, Samuel came out against them
for to go up to the high place
